package.name: TweakHub快捷插件-Rootless
package.shortDescription: 桌面空白处设置手势动作打开已安装插件列表，三种手势：可设置为双指点击，三指点击。双指捏合。List all installed tweaks and access their settings directly. With this tweak, you can view a popup that displays all installed tweaks on your system. Quickly access the settings of each tweak with just a tap.

descriptionlist.description: 桌面空白处设置手势动作打开已安装插件列表，三种手势：可设置为双指点击，三指点击。双指捏合。List all installed tweaks and access their settings directly. With this tweak, you can view a popup that displays all installed tweaks on your system. Quickly access the settings of each tweak with just a tap.

全能玩机源
